chart.name: max-color
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with a column 3 value of max-colorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: mid-color
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with a column 3 value midway between max-colorValue and min-colorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: min-color
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with the column 3 value of min-colorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: max-post-depth
chart.description: How many levels of nodes beyond maxDepth to show in 'hinted' fashion.

chart.name: show-scale
chart.description: Whether or not to show a color gradient scale from min-color to max-color along the top of the chart. Specify true to show the scale.

chartTitle.name: title
chartTitle.description: Title to display above the chart.

chartTitle.name: bold
chartTitle.description: Set true for title with bold font.

chartTitle.name: italic
chartTitle.description: Set true for title text in italic style.
